title: Scrub Field
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. Wildflowers grow among the grasses. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. Small shrubs and stunted trees poke out of the grasses sporadically. The land is gently sloped down to the north, gently sloped down to the east, gently sloped up to the south, gently sloped up to the west.
